resources.string: Karuah Chess uses StockFish 16.1 with neural network version nn-b1a57edbea57.nnue (Big) and nn-baff1ede1f90.nnue (Small).\n
You can find out more about StockFish at https://stockfishchess.org.\n
The full source code for Karuah Chess is available at https://github.com/karuahsoftware/karuahchess .\n

Karuah Chess is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for full details at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt.\n
The game is unable to start as a database error occurred.\n\nClose the application and try again.

If that fails, some other things to try;\n
Uninstall and reinstall the application on your device.\n
Clear the application data for Karuha Chess. This is usually done by going in to Settings -> Apps -> Karuah Chess -> Storage on your device. Then select \"Clear data\".
